attrs.name: trigger
attrs.desc: Trigger mode; The optional values of this attribute are click / focus / hover / manual
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is click.

attrs.name: content
attrs.desc: Displayed content, which can also be transferred to the DOM through slot.

attrs.name: width
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is the minimum width 150px.

attrs.name: placement
attrs.desc: Location; The optional value of this attribute is top/top-start/top-end/bottom/bottom-start/bottom-end/left/left-start/left-end/right/right-start/right-end
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is bottom.

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: offset
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: arrow-offset
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: transform-origin
attrs.desc: The rotation center of the component
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: append-to-body
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: transition
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is fade-in-linear.

attrs.name: visible-arrow
attrs.desc: Whether to display the Tooltip arrow.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: popper-options
attrs.desc: Parameters of popper.js; The optional value of this attribute is a reference to the popper.js document
attrs.defaultValue: The default value for this attribute is {boundariesElement: 'body', gpuAcceleration: false}

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Add a class name for popper

attrs.name: open-delay
attrs.desc: Display delay when the trigger mode is hover, in milliseconds.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: close-delay
attrs.desc: Hide delay when the trigger mode is hover, in milliseconds.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 200.

slots.name: reference
slots.desc: HTML element that triggers popover display

events.name: after-enter
events.desc: This event is triggered after the animation is played.

events.name: after-leave
events.desc: Triggered after the hidden animation is played.
